content:
Could it be that the Slicing Patient Telecom example on https://www.hl7.org/fhir/profiling-examples.html#contacts is not correct? First of all the slices should contain sliceName.

And the third slice (email) does not contain a fixed element, which is not correct according to the definition (https://www.hl7.org/fhir/profiling.html#discriminator):

If the type is value, or pattern, then the element definition must use either:

ElementDefinition.fixed[x], or
ElementDefinition.pattern[x], or
if the element has a terminology binding, a required binding with a Value Set that enumerates the list of possible codes in the value set ("extensional definition")

Am I right or do I miss something?
